snippet: Though there is a moratorium on new custom license tags in New York state, a loophole of sorts has allowed the Super Bowl champs to get the honor.
abstract: Decision by New York State's Motor Vehicles Dept to release a commemorative license plate in honor of the New York Giants' Super Bowl victory angers groups that have been trying for years to get their own customized plates; moratorium on new custom plates, in place since a 2004 lawsuit, has held up hundreds of requests for custom designs; department officials say that Giants plate does not violate the ban because it is an alteration of an existing plate, not a new design.
lead_paragraph: Though there is a moratorium on new custom license tags in New York state, a loophole of sorts has allowed the Super Bowl champs to get the honor.

headline.seo: Giants Get Custom License Plate, but Some Aren’t Cheering
headline.main: Giants Car Tag Upsets Groups Still Waiting for Their Own
headline.print_headline: Giants Car Tag Upsets Groups Still Waiting For Their Own
